path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Fall 24/Pharmacology/Documents/Module VIII/Pharmacology Objectives Module 8 Respiratory.pdf
text: TEMPLE COLLEGE SCHOOL OF VOCATIONAL NURSING VNSG 1331: PHARMACOLOGY Objectives Module 8 Drugs that affect the Respiratory System Chapters 31 & 32 1. Discuss the actions, uses, adverse reactions, contraindications, precautions, and interactions of drugs that affect the respiratory system. 2. Implement important pre-administration and ongoing focused assessment activities the nurse should perform on a patient taking a drug that affects the respiratory system. 3. Use the nursing process to implement care for a patient receiving a drug that affects the respiratory system. 4. Identify important points to keep in mind when educating patients and families about the use of the drugs covered in this module.
